resources.string: Not an Nayagadi Agent? No Problem.
Become Nayagadi Agent by creating an account with your the personal Information like Name, Phone Number and Address
Find a Lead in your Locatlity.
Refer a potential customer\'s by providing Name, Phone number and interested vehicle on Nayagadi App. Nayagadi will follow up with customer and assist vehicle purchase.
If customer referred by you makes the vehicle purchase through Nayagadi, you will get the reward money to your bank account. Its that simple.
By creating an account, you agree that you are over 18 years and have agreed to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Notice of Nayagadi.
